definitions.description: Stores information on the actual waste quantity of the organization.

constantValues: Stores information on the actual waste quantity of the organization.

members.name: wastequantityId
members.description: Unique identifier for entity instances.

members.name: TTLInSeconds
members.description: Time to live in seconds.

members.name: partitionId
members.description: Logical partition identifier. A logical partition consists of a set of records with same partition ID.

constantValues: Logical partition identifier. A logical partition consists of a set of records with same partition ID.

members.name: createdOn
members.description: Date and time when the record was created.

constantValues: Date and time when the record was created.

members.name: modifiedOn
members.description: Date and time when the record was modified.

constantValues: Date and time when the record was modified.

members.name: importSequenceNumber
members.description: Sequence number of the import that created this record.

constantValues: Sequence number of the import that created this record.

members.name: overriddenCreatedOn
members.description: Date and time that the record was migrated.

constantValues: Date and time that the record was migrated.

members.name: name
members.description: The name of the custom entity.

constantValues: The name of the custom entity.

members.name: cost
members.description: Cost associated with waste diversion.

members.name: costunit
members.description: Unit associated with the cost quantity.

constantValues: Unit associated with the cost quantity.

members.name: dataqualitytype
members.description: Description of the data quality that identifies if the data is actual, estimated, or other descriptors of the data.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

supportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'dataqualitytype_display' is added to the 'WasteQuantity' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'dataqualitytype'
supportingAttribute.name: dataqualitytype_display

constantValues: Description of the data quality that identifies if the data is actual, estimated, or other descriptors of the data.

members.name: description
members.description: Optional description to give additional detail to the entity or attribute..

constantValues: Optional description to give additional detail to the entity or attribute..

members.name: diversionenddate
members.description: End date of the period for which the waste diverted needs to be reported.

constantValues: End date of the period for which the waste diverted needs to be reported.

members.name: diversionmethod
members.description: Method of waste diversion, such as recovery or disposal.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}
constantValues: Waste diverted from disposal by recovery

supportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'diversionmethod_display' is added to the 'WasteQuantity' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'diversionmethod'
supportingAttribute.name: diversionmethod_display

constantValues: Method of waste diversion, such as recovery or disposal.

members.name: diversionmethodsubtype
members.description: Field to further classify the waste diversion method.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

supportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'diversionmethodsubtype_display' is added to the 'WasteQuantity' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'diversionmethodsubtype'
supportingAttribute.name: diversionmethodsubtype_display

constantValues: Field to further classify the waste diversion method.

members.name: diversionstartdate
members.description: Start date of the period for which the waste diverted needs to be reported.

constantValues: Start date of the period for which the waste diverted needs to be reported.

members.name: evidence
members.description: Optional field where evidence such as invoice, system records can be linked to an entity or attribute, if required.

constantValues: Optional field where evidence such as invoice, system records can be linked to an entity or attribute, if required.

members.name: expensetype
members.description: Describes the expense type associated with the waste diversion operation.

constantValues: Describes the expense type associated with the waste diversion operation.

members.name: facility
members.description: Unique identifier for facility associated with waste diversion operation.

constantValues: Unique identifier for facility associated with waste diversion operation.

members.name: industrialprocesstype
members.description: Type of industrial process used to track and associate with the waste diversion operation.

constantValues: Type of industrial process used to track and associate with the waste diversion operation.

members.name: material
members.description: Material composition of the waste such as glass, plastic, metals, or biomass.

constantValues: Material composition of the waste such as glass, plastic, metals, or biomass.

members.name: organizationalunit
members.description: Unique identifier for the organizational unit associated with waste diversion operation.

constantValues: Unique identifier for the organizational unit associated with waste diversion operation.

members.name: valuechainpartner
members.description: Reference to the value chain partner or supplier associated with the transaction.

constantValues: Reference to the value chain partner or supplier associated with the transaction.

members.name: wastediversionsitetype
members.description: The site type where the waste diversion occurs.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

supportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'wastediversionsitetype_display' is added to the 'WasteQuantity' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'wastediversionsitetype'
supportingAttribute.name: wastediversionsitetype_display

constantValues: The site type where the waste diversion occurs.

members.name: wastetype
members.description: Reference to the classification of the waste type and category.

constantValues: Reference to the classification of the waste type and category.

members.name: wastevolume
members.description: Optional field for the volume of waste diverted.

constantValues: Optional field for the volume of waste diverted.

members.name: wastevolumeunit
members.description: Unit associated with the volume of waste diverted.

constantValues: Unit associated with the volume of waste diverted.

members.name: wasteweight
members.description: Weight of the waste diverted.

members.description: Unit associated with the weight of waste diverted.
